ValidationRule.description: Renewals are direct bill only, NB can be both agency/direct
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$Setup.Master_Validation__c.Account_Active__c && NOT(OR($RecordType.Name = "Health & Benefits", $RecordType.Name = "Scale")) &&
AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Billing__c , "Direct")), CONTAINS(Coverages__c, "Directors & Officers"), ISPICKVAL(Policy_Type_Status__c , "Renewal"), ISCHANGED( StageName ), ISPICKVAL( StageName, "Proposal Approved/Closed Won"), Marketer_UW__c = "PHILADELPHIA INSURANCE COMPANY")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Philly D&O must be Direct Bill for Renewals
